item.description:
Same format we've been doing -- the talks, the milling around, the food, the beer.

Full Talks: (more tbd)

  • ZooKeeper -- Anders Bronworth


I'll post more details here once I know the talks for sure -- hoping to bring back Cyrus Katrak for a Lightning Talk about Avro (he was sidelined by the sickness, last time), some other options out there.

Also, I'd love to get some more Lightning Talks -- it's a fun format.

Anyone with ideas for a talk, or a tutorial, please contact me.

And, as is the Boston Hadoop Meetup tradition: There Will Be Food. There Will Be Beer.
item.name: Hadoop Meetup Strikes Back
